original: intros H1 H2. apply is_LimSup_LimInf_lim_seq. - apply is_LimSup_seq. intros eps. destruct H1 as [N1 H1]. split. + exists N1. intros n Hn. destruct (H1 n Hn) as [_ H1n]. auto. + exists N1. intros n Hn. destruct (H1 n Hn) as [H1n _]. auto. - apply is_LimInf_seq. intros eps. destruct H1 as [N1 H1]. split. + exists N1. intros n Hn. destruct (H1 n Hn) as [H1n _]. auto. + exists N1. intros n Hn. destruct (H1 n Hn) as [_ H1n]. auto.
